name: Bright Paw
storyline:
Bright Paw is a premium narrative puzzle game, in which you play as Theo, the cat of a typically British Supervillain who has just been murdered.

Bright Paw offers a casual puzzle experience using interesting mechanics with an engaging narrative to draw the player into the world.

The game has a focus on exploring the world while chasing the killer, shifting to a darker and more personal tone halfway through, introducing mechanics every few levels
summary: Bright Paw is a premium narrative puzzle game in which you play as Theo, the cat of a supervillain who has just been murdered. Bright Paw features fully voiced narration, and a custom soundtrack composed by Will Bedford
